1.content:
In neverland....

Peter: I'm really bored. I hate being bored.
Slightly: how about you go to the real world?
Peter: ok then.
He flies off
1.title: Start

11.content:
While he was flying. He saw hook. Then he flew some more.
He flew out of neverland.
11.title: Continue

111.content: Peter flew around for a while, he tried to do something interesting but he was too bored. Then he flew over a city he didn't know, and went in looking for adventure.
111.title: Continue

1111.content:
He landed at the house where Maisie was staying.
He saw Maisie sitting on some steps.
1111.title: Next

11111.content:
Peter: she's beautiful.
The wind blows her hair and Peter sees her brown eyes.
He goes to a nearby tree to watch her.
11111.title: Continue

111111.content:
Peter observes Maisie.
Peter:(thinks) She looks bored.
111111.title: Continue

1111112.content:
Maisie: what to do now....
Maisie's mum: Maisie! Time for tea.
Maisie: ok!
1111112.title: Maisie's POV

11111121.content: Peter:(watches as Maisie goes in, confused) Tea? This I got to see. (Crawls closer to the window)
11111121.title: Continue

111111211.content:
He sees different kinds of food he didn't reconigse.
Peter: they look nice.
111111211.title: Next

1111112111.content:
Peter looks inside and sees lots of things he never seen before
Peter:Wow.
1111112111.title: Continue

11111121111.content: Peter: I have got to tell the lost boys. Also Maisie is pretty...
11111121111.title: Next

111111211111.content: Peter moves away and flies back to neverland.
111111211111.title: Continue

1111112111111.content: Slightly: really? what kind of food?
1111112111111.title: They believe him

11111121111112.content:
Peter:It was different, but the real interesting thing is the girl there.
Slightly:(playfuly) Looks like Peter likes a girl.
Peter:(blushes slightly) I do not.
Lost boys:(playfuly) Do too!
11111121111112.title: Peter tells them about maisie

111111211111121.content: Slightly: what was her name?
111111211111121.title: Next

choices: They mess with him some more
1111112111111211.content:
Peter:(dreamly) Maisie.........
Lost boys:(playfully) Peter likes a girl! Peter likes a girl!
Peter:(blushes) I said quit it!
1111112111111211.title: Continue

11111121111112111.title: They mess with him some more

11111121111112112.content:
Nibs: ok lover boy.
Peter: (glares at Nibs)
11111121111112112.title: They stop for now

111111211111121121.content:
Peter:Anyway.......Lets go and see what old hook is doing.
Lost boys:Alright.
(They head out)
111111211111121121.title: Continue

11111121111112112112.content: Peter flies back to see Maisie.
11111121111112112112.title: Later...

111111211111121121121.content: Maisie is in bed asleep.
111111211111121121121.title: Next

1111112111111211211211.content: Peter:(watches from the window, dreamly) She's so pretty when she sleeps. (Touches his chest) What is this feeling I have? It feels like butterflies fell in my gut!
1111112111111211211211.title: Continue

11111121111112112112111.content: Peter dashes away from the window.
11111121111112112112111.title: Maisie wakes up

111111211111121121121111.content: Peter touches his chest again, breathing deeply. Peter:It got stronger when she nearly saw me. Maisie.
111111211111121121121111.title: Continue

1111112111111211211211111.content: He looks again. She is fast asleep.
1111112111111211211211111.title: Look again

11111121111112112112111111.content: Peter:(thinks) I feel like going in, but that's rude. But I don't want her to ignore me.
11111121111112112112111111.title: Continue

111111211111121121121111111.content: Peter: (thinks) I'll leave a thumbtack. Should I kiss her?
111111211111121121121111111.title: Go in

1111112111111211211211111111.content: Peter quietly leaves a thumbtack and kisses Maisie, then flies off even faster with a big smile on his face.
1111112111111211211211111111.title: Kiss her

11111121111112112112111111111.content:
Maisie wakes up confused.
Maisie: who kissed me?
11111121111112112112111111111.title: Morning

111111211111121121121111111111.content: Charolotte:(wakes up to Maisie talking, sleepy) Huh? What are you talking about? A kiss?
111111211111121121121111111111.title: Continue

1111112111111211211211111111111111.content: Charlotte:(makes a face) No, (Mocking) Maisie in love! Maisie's in love!
1111112111111211211211111111111111.title: Continue

11111121111112112112111111111111111.content: Maisie: but I don't know who kissed me. But he left a gift. (holds up thumb tack)
11111121111112112112111111111111111.title: Next

111111211111121121121111111111111111.content: Slightly:(shakes Peter) Peter. Peter wake up. (Shouts) PETER! Peter:(wakes up) Wha-?! I'm up I'm up! Slightly:You were mumbling in you sleep about that girl you like. Peter:Oh sorry, just a late night.
111111211111121121121111111111111111.title: In Neverland

11111121111112112112111111111111111111.content:
Slightly:(grins)
Peter:(still blushing)Don't even start.
11111121111112112112111111111111111111.title: Continue

111111211111121121121111111111111111111.content:
Curly: (goes up to him and inspects his mouth) (gasps) you kissed her!
Peter: (blushes a deep red)
111111211111121121121111111111111111111.title: Mock Peter

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content: Charlotte was driving Maisie up the wall with her questions on who kissed her.
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Back in Spain

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content:
Maisie: I don't know!
She goes exploring with the house dog Leon.
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Next

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content: The lost boys were mocking Peter about kissing Maisie.
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: In neverland

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content:
Slightly: you like Maisie!!
Peter: (blushes) shut up!
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Continue

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content:
Slightly:(mocking) You kissed Maisie, you love Maisie!
Peter:(blushes) I said shut up! That's none of your business!
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Continue

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content:
Curly: guys leave him.
Peter: (flies to visit the mermaids)
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: They take a break

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content:
Peter was watching Maisie outside her window.
Peter:(sees her sleeping, thinks) She looks so lovley when she sleeps.
(He opens the window and goes in)
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: later that night

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content: He goes up to her bed.
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: She stays asleep

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content:
Maise snozes away as Peter floats just above her.
Peter floats down and kisses Maisie on the lips.
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: she doesn't wake up

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content:
She kisses back.
Peter: (blushes)
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: She still is sleeping

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content: Peter leaves a small thumbtack by her bed and kisses Maisie one last time before he soars out.
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Continue

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content:
Maisie woke up and smiled.
She got up and went downstairs.
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: In the morning.....

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content:
Charlotte was waiting for her.
Charlotte:(smiles) Your night time kisser came didn't he? (Makes kissing nosies)
Maisie:(blushes)
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Continue

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content: Maisie: Yeah. (giggles)
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Next

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content: Peter was sleeping, dreaming about how Maisie kissed him back.
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: At the hideout

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content:
Slightly: (walks in)
Peter: (smiles in his sleep)
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Someone walks in

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content:
Slightly grins and grabs a bucket and spashes Peter with it.
Peter:(wakes up coughing) What was that for?!
Slightly:(still grinning) You were dreaming of Maisie weren't you?
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Continue

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content:
Peter: (blushes) Yes I was.
Slightly: you should bring her here!
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Ok I was

choices: Peter decides to bring Maise to Neverland next night
Peter stay with her in Spain
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content:
Peter:(nervous) Maisie......here? I.....I don't know
Slightly:Well you can't keep hiding forever. (Leaves)
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Continue

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content: Peter: I'll have to wake her up. First I'll see the mermaids. Maybe they'll know.
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Peter decides to bring Maise to Neverland next ...

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content: Peter goes to the mermaids.
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Continue

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content: Millie: you should bring her here.
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: They know

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content: Peter:But she might not want to come. What should I do?
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Continue

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content:
Allie: hmm I don't know.
Millie: She may be sick of everyone telling her to grow up.
Peter: ok then.
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Next

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content: Peter prepairs a spare bed closest to his for Maisie, wasting time for night to come.
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Continue

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content: Peter goes to Spain.
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: That night

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content: Peter quietly goes in the house and float over to Maisie, making sure he looked somewhat nice and lightly wakes her up with a kiss on the lips.
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Continue

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content: Maisie: Oh, hello. So you're my night kisser.
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: She is calm

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content:
Peter:(blushes) Yes, I've been kissing you.
Maisie:Why?
Peter:(blushing) Well your so pretty and nice, it felt like a good thing to do.
Maisie: I guess, thank you.
Peter:(hesitantly) Would you like to see a magical place?
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Continue

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content:
Peter: Neverland.
Maisie: Neverland? Where's that?
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: What do you mean?

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content:
Peter:It's a far away place where time has no meaning. (Shyly) but if you want to stay here, I am fine with that.
Maisie:Hrmm.......
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Continue

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content:
Maisie: will I have to grow up?
Peter: no. Also, time doesn't change. It'll stay night until you come back to spain.
Maisie: cool.
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Go with him to Neverland

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content: Peter:(extends his hand) Take my hand and we'll go.
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Continue

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content: Maisie: (takes his hand) but I can't fly.
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Take his hand

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content: Peter:(throws fairy dust on her) That's where I come in, don't worry though, I know what I'm doing. (They fly out)
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Continue

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content:
Maisie: this is amazing!
Peter: Let's fly through that Spanish town
Maisie: ok!
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: While flying

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content: Does anyone see them?
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: They fly through the town

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content: Spanish kids do. But they are all confused.
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Yes

choices: I could show you how to speak it
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content:
Peter:(confused) What are they saying?
Maisie:Maybe "Those two are flying!"
Peter:They sound very weird, I've never heard it before.
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Continue

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content:
Maisie: they are speaking spanish it's a language they speak here.
Peter: oh.
Maisie: I'll teach you.
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: I could show you how to speak it

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content: Peter:Ok, well lets go to Neverland! (They fly off)
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Continue

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content: Maisie: wow!
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: In the clouds above Neverland

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content:
Peter:(blushes) I know, um Maise?
Maisie:(turns to face him) Yes?
Peter:(still blushing) Your not upset that I was kissing you?
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Continue

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content: Maisie: (blushes a deep red)
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: No.....no really

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content: They go to the hideout.
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Continue

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content: Were the lost boys there?
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Continue

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content: Maisie was up in her room drawing. She was humming a little happy tune while she was drawing.
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: In Spain......

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content: The lost boys started calling Peter "lover boy, lovestruck." then they called Maisie and Peter "Star crossed lovers"
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Continue

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content:
Peter: (blushes)
Slightly: Suure you weren't.
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: No.....no I wasn't!

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content: Peter:(sighs and gets up) It's weird, I don't understand why I feel like this.
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Continue

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content: Nibs (comes in): Hi Peter.
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Next

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content: Peter: Hey Nibs.
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Continue

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content: Nibs: Why he is blushing?
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Next

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content:
Slightly: Guess.
Nibs: (thinks) Oh.
Peter: (blushes slightly)
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Continue

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content: Maisie was in her pool.
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: In Spain

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content: Maisie: (swimming around thinking about Peter)
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Next

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content: Charlotte: (swims next to her) Are you OK? You look distant.
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Continue

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content: Maisie: I'm Fine.
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Next

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content:
Charlotte: You sure?
Maisie: (nods)
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Continue

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content: All the lost boys saw peter come in a bit dazed but happy.
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: At the hideaway.....

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content:
Slightly: why are you so dazed?
Curly: what happened?
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Continue

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content:
Peter: she....she kissed me back..
Slightly: Peter's in love!!
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Continue

1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.content: Peter: (blushes a deep red)
1111112111111211211211111111111111111112.title: Continue

11111121112.content:
Maisie looks up and sees him.
Maisie: huh?
Peter: (ducks)
11111121112.title: Maisie sees him

1112.content: Maisie was swimming in the pool
1112.title: Masise's POV

1113.content:
After spying on some Spanish kids, he flew to a old Spanish house.
He sat on a nearby tree and watched the pool.
1113.title: Later

112.content: Maisie: (reading a book by the pool)
112.title: In Spain....

1121.content:
Peter: (flies down into a tree and watches the pool)
Maisie: hmm..
Peter: (looks to see Maisie)
1121.title: Continue

11211.content: Peter: She looks bored.... and pretty...
11211.title: continue

12.content: Maisie: (reading a book by the pool) Gosh, i'm bored.
12.title: In Spain...

121.content: Suddenly Peter surprises Maise. Peter:(scary face, floating in the air) BOO! (Makes jumps in surprise)
121.title: Continue

12111.content: Peter:(laughs with her, floating in the air) I got you good!
12111.title: Continue

1211111.content: Peter: Did I scare you too much? Sorry if I did.
1211111.title: Continue

12111112.content: Maisie: No you didn't. Have I met you before?
12111112.title: Nah

121111121.content: Peter: Nope, but I bet you know who I am, right?
121111121.title: Continue

12111112121.content: Peter:(goofy smile) You got it! (Pulls out his sword and strikes a pose, starts laughing) You must know a lot about me.
12111112121.title: Continue

121111121211.content: Maisie: There's movies and a book about you! (giggles slightly)
121111121211.title: Yep.

1211111212111.content: Peter:(looks confused) Um... what's a movie? Is that a story?
1211111212111.title: Continue

12111112121111.content: Maisie: It's hard to explain.
12111112121111.title: Next

121111121211111.content: Peter: Huh. (Goes back to smiling) So do you want to go on an adventure?
121111121211111.title: Continue

12111112121111111.content: Peter:(extends his hands) Take my hands.
12111112121111111.title: Continue

1211111212111111111.content: They float slightly off the ground. Peter:( as Maisie looks down) I got you, don't let go.
1211111212111111111.title: Continue

121111121211111111111.content: They soar through the skys.
121111121211111111111.title: Continue

12111112121111111111111.content: Peter:(smiling) Is flying as fun as you thought it would be?
12111112121111111111111.title: Continue

121111121211111111111111111.content: Peter: I want to show you something, is that OK?
121111121211111111111111111.title: Continue

12111112121111111111111111111.content: Peter takes her to Neverland.
12111112121111111111111111111.title: Continue

121111121211111111111111111111.content: Maisie: (gasps) Oh my gosh! I've always wanted to come here!
121111121211111111111111111111.title: Next

1211111212111111111111111111111.content: Peter:(smiling) Well now your here.
1211111212111111111111111111111.title: Continue

12111112121111111111111111111111111.content: They stay in each others arms until Peter brings her down on the island.
12111112121111111111111111111111111.title: Continue

1211111212111111111111111111111111111.content: Peter:(sighs happily) It's good to be back.
1211111212111111111111111111111111111.title: Continue

121111121211111111111111111111111111111.content: Peter:(starts walking) Let's see how the lost boys are.
121111121211111111111111111111111111111.title: Continue

1211111212111111111111111111111111111111.content: Lost boys: (tackle Peter to the ground)
1211111212111111111111111111111111111111.title: Ambush!

1211111212111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Lost boys: Hiya Peter
Nibs: (sees Maisie) Who's this?
1211111212111111111111111111111111111111.title: Continue

1211111212111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Peter: My new friend Maisie.
Maisie: (smiles)
Nibs: She's a girl.
Maisie: (frowns)
1211111212111111111111111111111111111111.title: continue

1211111212111111111111111111111111111111.content: They walk into the hideout.
1211111212111111111111111111111111111111.title: Nothing happens

1211111212111111111111111111111111111111.content: The lost boys were having a mud fight
1211111212111111111111111111111111111111.title: Continue

1211111212111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Maisie picks up a mud ball and throws it at Slightly.
Slightly: Hey! (looks at Maisie) Who are you?
Maisie: Maisie Newell.
1211111212111111111111111111111111111111.title: join in

1212.content:
Charlotte: Maisie! Dinner is ready.
Maisie: I'll be back soon. Keep out of sight.
Peter: You're the only one that can see me.
Maisie: Just be careful though.
1212.title: Maise's sister comes out

12121.content: Makes goes inside, Peter follows but no one could see him.
12121.title: Continue

121211.content:
Maisie: (sits down)
Maisie's mother: How are you Maisie?
Maisie: Ok
121211.title: Next

1212111.content: Peter flies around the room and makes funny faces at everyone.
1212111.title: Continue

12121111.content: Maisie: (goes cross eyed at Peter)
12121111.title: Next

121211111.content: Peter laughs. Maisie's mother: What are you staring at?
121211111.title: Continue

12121111111.content:
Charlotte: (looks out of the window)
Peter: (ducks)
12121111111.title: Continue

121211111111.content: Charlotte goes back to her food after a bit.
121211111111.title: Continue

12121111111111.content: Maisie tries not to laugh but his faces were pretty funny.
12121111111111.title: Continue

121211111111111.content: Maisie: (bites her lip to stop from laughing)
121211111111111.title: Next

1212111111111111.content: Charlotte gets up from her seat and rushes to the window, only to find nothing. Maisie's mother: Sit down, dinner isn't over. (Charlotte sits back down, Peter makes one last funny face and floats towards the pool)
1212111111111111.title: Continue

121211111111111111.content: Maisie finishes her meal and goes to see Peter, who was balancing on a chair.
121211111111111111.title: Continue

12121111111111111111.content: Peter:(sees her, smiles and does a flip in the air before landing in front of her) So what do you want to do?
12121111111111111111.title: Continue

1212111111111111111111.content: Peter jumps in with her but his splash was quieter.
1212111111111111111111.title: Continue

121211111111111111111111.content: Peter splashes her and laughs.
121211111111111111111111.title: Continue

12121111111111111111111111.content: Peter splashes her back, still laughing.
12121111111111111111111111.title: Continue

121211111111111111111111111111.content: Peter:(goofy smile) Want to see a cool trick?
121211111111111111111111111111.title: Continue

12121111111111111111111111111111.content: Peter soars straight up in the air about 50 feet before doing a amazing cannonball into the pool.
12121111111111111111111111111111.title: Super dooper Peter Pan cannonball

1212111111111111111111111111111111.content: Peter:(squirts water, goofy smile) Thanks.
1212111111111111111111111111111111.title: Continue

12121111111111111111111111111111111.content: Maisie: (jumps out of the pool and dives in)
12121111111111111111111111111111111.title: Next

12121111111111111111111111111111111111.content: Peter smiles underwater, then blushes and rises back to the top.
12121111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Continue

1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.content: Peter was taking deep breaths when Maisie appears.
1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Continue

1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.content: Maisie: (looks around)
1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Next

1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.content: Peter surprises Maisie again. Peter:(from above, scary voice and face) BOOOOOOOOO!
1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Continue

1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.content: Maisie: (jumps and splashes him)
1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Next

1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.content: Peter laughs and splashes back.
1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Continue

1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.content: Maisie: (gets out of the pool and dries off)
1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Next

1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.content: Peter flies out of the pool and shakes off the water, smiling.
1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Continue

1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.content: Maisie smiles.
1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Next

1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.content: Maisie's mother:(calling from inside) Maisie! It's time for bed!
1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Continue

1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.content: Maisie: Ok!
1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Next

1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.content: Peter:(whispers) Bye, I'll come by tomorrow.
1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Continue

1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.content: Maisie: (Nods) (goes inside)
1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Next

1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.content: Maisie and her family sleep well.
1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Continue

1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.content: Maisie: (wakes up)
1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: The next morning

1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.content: Charlotte stays asleep as Maisie gets up.
1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Continue

1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.content: Peter was still asleep.
1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: In Neverland

1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.content: Nibs: (Pours a bucket of cold water on Peter)
1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Continue

1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Peter: (wakes up and coughs) What was that for?!
Nibs: You were dreaming still. You spent alot of time in the real world.
Peter: So?
1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Continue

1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.content: Nibs: Hmm...
1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: continue

1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.content: Maiisie was waiting on the balcony.
1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: The next night

1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Peter came.
Maisie: Hi.
Peter: (blushes slightly) Hi.
1212111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Continue

13.content: Maisie was reading a book by the pool
13.title: Maisie's POV

131.content:
Peter flew down and sat in a tree.
He saw Maisie reading a book
131.title: Continue

1311.content:
Peter: (stares at Maisie curiously)
Maisie: (sighs)
1311.title: Continue

131111.content: Peter: What is she doing?
131111.title: Continue

info.brief_description: Basically Peter's point of view of how he met maisie and how Maisie met him.
info.description:
Rules:

No innapropiate stuff
Peter and Maisie can have a romance as long it isn't innapropiate

Have fun!
